comment:
Distance: 1300m Conditions: light winds, great water! Comments: In the 3V8 race, Belmont Hill was ahead but drifted into Exeter's lane after the River Street bridge, forcing Exeter to alter their course. The race was finished, but then re-rowed upstream with the crews going through different arches and the course shortened to approx 1200 meters.
A great day of racing between the two schools -- thanks to Exeter for making the trip down!

None
regatta_display_name: NEIRA Boys Eights,Belmont Hill vs Exeter, lower boats
